Npc0285:
ï¿½I have a lot of old, broken junk, but I hate to throw anything away.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you have a friend who is knowledgeable about mechanics,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that person might be able to fix something for you overnight...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Man, a friend like that would be so handy...[HALT][END]
